metadata.synopsis: Tells the finishing part of the story conveyed by the paintings in a puzzle. Does finish the story correctly.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on S_WYR_PaintingPuzzle_SolutionPainting1_31746c94-4f33-4bc2-8348-5952c6bf0947 or any other instance of UNI_WYR_PaintingPuzzle_SolutionPainting1_c97a9198-0dff-4dca-b2f0-75e680446a4a

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *'The Hanging.' A red-haired man is depicted hanging from a gallows as a crowd looks on.*

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You notice a child in the crowd, a falling tear leaving a trail on his cheek.*
